{{Wired embedded system |brand=Olimex |model=AM3352-SOM-EVB |revision=Rev D |asin=B07M9CY1VR;FR; |price=82 |est_release_date=February 2015 |manuf_country=Bulgaria |is_manuf=No |type=single-board computer |flags=Micro SD Card slot, VGA out, CAN Bus, UEXT, GPIO, |pwr_v=6-16 |pwr_conn=barrel plug |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=10 |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=AM3352 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |fla1=0 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G16460-BCK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=4 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, populated, |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1), |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=SMSC |eth_chip2_model=8710A |eth_chip3_brand=SMSC |eth_chip3_model=8710A |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, 3.3V CAN Bus Transceiver;TI;SN65HVD230;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6280;;2;,,, 2A, 18V Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1482;;1;,,, Octal Buffer Driver;Texas Instruments;SN74ALVC244;;6;,,, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2016.09 |stock_os=Linux;4.4.59;Debian 8;, |oui_eth=1C:BA:8C }} {{TagLine|Reference Design Evaluation Board}} :[https://www.olimex.com/Products/SOM/AM335X/AM3352-SOM-EVB/open-source-hardware Product page]
===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Texas Instruments]]'' AM3352 @1GHz Cortex-A8 :2 Programmable Real-Time Units @200Mhz *GPU: ''PowerVR SGX530'' *Memory: 512MB DDR3 SDRAM *Onboard Storage: TF card (max. 128GB)/MMC card slot *Ports: 2x GbE LAN, 4x USB 2.0 ports. 1x CAN
===Links=== *[https://github.com/OLIMEX/SOM/tree/master/AM3352/AM3352-SOM-EVB Open Source/Open Hardware Schematics] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/02/19/olimex-announces-availability-of-ti-am3352-and-rockchip-rk3188-som-and-evaluation-boards/ ''Olimex Announces Availability of TI AM3352'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/olimex-dives-into-linuxandroid-modules/ ''Olimex dives into Linux/Android modules'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
